current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To provide additional flexibility to the Board of
		  Governors of the Federal Reserve System to establish capital standards that are
		  properly tailored to the unique characteristics of the business of insurance,
		  and for other purposes.
